text: Sergei Ivanovich Adian, also Adyan (; ; 1 January 1931 – 5 May 2020) was a Soviet and Russian mathematician. He was a professor at the Moscow State University. He was known for his work in group theory, especially on the Burnside problem. Adian died on 5 May 2020, aged 89.Скончался Сергей Иванович Адян ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian mathematicians Category:Algebraists Category:Moscow State University faculty
title: Sergei Adian
